description: Compendium moralium notabilium; Cristoforo Cortese (Italian, active Venice, Italy 1390 - 1445), and Novella Master (Italian, active Padua, Italy 1396 - 1410), and Heremias de Montagnone (Italian (Paduan), about 1250/1260 - 1321); Venice, Veneto, Italy; 1400 to 1425; Tempera colors, pen and ink, and gold leaf on parchment bound between wood boards covered with red velvet; Leaf: 36.8 × 26 cm (14 1/2 × 10 1/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIV 8; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
